channel.title: [Help Me] Port Forwarding
channel.description:
Yes, this seems like the most PAINFUL thing to do when creating a server. But here is the deal.
I used: PortForward.com just like advertised in the "How to make a server" tuturial. I've found my router.
Now it gives me a list of things that I need to chose to Forward a Port from it.
WHAT THE HECK DO I USE LOL?
Someone PLEASE! help me!
If I get helped, I'll erase all this, put the general question and then leave the thread alone for others to see the answers left.
Please help :)

item.title: [Help Me] Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @I_Like_Cake I Like Cake
